_header: Full long I have a servant be
Subjects: Cupid; occasional poems; love lyrics; envoys
_description: John Lydgate, ‘The Servant of Cupyde forsaken’, A New Year’s Gift — nine 8-line stanzas and Envoy

BLAdd16165.First Lines:
fful longe I haue a seruant beon to mighty god
                    cupyde…
BLAdd16165.Last Lines:
…Whos galle ay newe doþ infectþe sugre of men in
                    euery place
BLAdd16165.Editions:
MacCracken,  Henry Noble,
                        ed.  
             John Lydgate: The Minor Poems, Vol. II: Secular Poems.
EETS
         o.s. 192 (1934); repr. 1961: 427-9.
